title: PHPrealpath_cache_size()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPrealpath_cache_size()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Return realpath cache size:
<?php
var_dump(realpath_cache_size());
?>
Run Example »
Definition and Usage
The realpath_cache_size() function returns realpath cache size.
Syntax
realpath_cache_size()
Technical Details
Return Value:
How much memory realpath cache is using
PHP Version:
5.3.2+

★
+1
